name: Puzzle Snowman
description:
Puzzle Snowman is a brain puzzle game.

When winters comes, the day of snowman plays for fun also coming. But it seems our little snowman is trapped in some ice block matrices. Can you figure out and find the right way for it?

Move the ice block up or down and clear the way to your objective! There are 20 levels included.
Click on and drag up an ice block to move it up, click and drag down it to move it down. Good luck and have fun!
